comment._content: Louis Freeland Post (1849-1928), lawyer and editor; acting US Secretary of Labor in 1920s: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Louis_Freeland_Post

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: Appointed U. S. Assistant Secretary of Labor in the Wilson administration, June, 1913. Served to 1921, when Harding administration took over.

comment.author: 33593953@N02
comment._content: Thanks for the information!  We add to the description when we update it.
